message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.SY, cs.MA. 

The paper presents a new perspective on reinforcement learning (RL) by reducing it to no-regret online learning. This makes it likely to belong to the machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. The paper also involves mathematical analysis and optimization, which suggests it could belong to the data structures and algorithms (cs.DS) sub-category. Additionally, the paper deals with control systems and decision making, which could place it in the systems and control (cs.SY) sub-category. Finally, the paper discusses the design of new RL algorithms, which could make it relevant to the multi-agent systems (cs.MA) sub-category.
